title: Asking How
description: Ask how to say things and convert conjugated sentences into questions.

lesson.instruction: By adding je at the end of a conjugated verb, we are converting it to a question on how the particular action is performed.
Conjugate the verb kuenda (to go) in the past tense.
How do you think you would ask "how did you go"?
How do you think you would ask "how will you go"? Remember to conjugate kuenda (to go) in the future tense.
lesson.english: How will you go to the store?
